alert.note: Alert for Northern Rosebud (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 9:49PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Rosebud County through 1030 PM MDT... At 946 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 20 miles southeast of Edwards to 12 miles northeast of Hysham. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail, along with heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Vananda. The strongest portions of these storms are expected to remain north of I-94 in northern Rosebud County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
